pkgmetadata.longdescription: # robotcode-runner[![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/robotcode-runner.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/robotcode-runner)[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/robotcode-runner.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/robotcode-runner)[![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/d-biehl/robotcode?style=flat&logo=apache)](https://github.com/d-biehl/robotcode/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)-----## IntroductionSome classes for [RobotCode](https://robotcode.io) plugin management## Installation```consolepip install robotcode-runner```## License`robotcode-runner` is distributed under the terms of the [Apache-2.0](https://spdx.org/licenses/Apache-2.0.html) license.
